Source code for JumpScale.grid.mongodbclient.MongoDBClient

from JumpScale import j

from pymongo import MongoClient


[docs]class MongoDBClient:


[docs]    def get(self, host='localhost', port=27017):
        try:
            client = MongoClient(host, int(port))
        except Exception,e:
            raise RuntimeError('Could not connect to mongodb server on %s:%s\nerror:%s' % (host, port,e))
        else:
            return client
